text: "Guy Snyder" was also the name of the son of Harry and Esther Snyder Guy Eugene Snyder Jr. (May 3, 1951 in Columbus, Ohio)Guy Snyder, in Science Fiction and Fantasy Literature, A Checklist, 1700-1974, Volume 2; edited by Robert Reginald; published 1978, by Gale Research Company is an American science fiction writer. In 1974, he was a finalist for the second ever John W. Campbell Award for Best New Writer,Campbell Awards, at TheHugoAwards.org; retrieved August 20, 2019 for his 1973 novel Testament XXI. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1951 births Category:Wayne State University alumni Category:American science fiction writers Category:Living people
title: Guy Snyder
